content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the rental price of the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, what was the reason for not agreeing on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The reason for not agreeing on a final price was that the landlord, Peter Schmidt, was still looking for a higher price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why would you rate the negotiation partner as a 10?
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate Peter Schmidt as a 10 on the likeability scale because he was respectful, straightforward, and open to negotiation. He clearly communicated his expectations and was patient throughout the negotiation process.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
